report_data.Post or Account Link: They smile in front of cameras while stabbing us from behind. The new politicians, the fake civilians — all part of the same disease. They must be uprooted entirely. No reform, no forgiveness. Total cleansing is the only cure.

classification:
After careful analysis, I classify it as:

Call for Violence

The post indirectly promotes violence by using words like "uprooted entirely" and "no reform, no forgiveness", implying collective revenge or eradication. The language used is strong and implies a complete removal of a perceived threat, which falls under the category of Call for Violence.
